p:
The dataset includes records of expansion on alien plant species in two groups (
Pinophyta and
Magnoliophyta ), 67 families, 247 genera and 413 species ( Senator 2020). The majority of the records is occupied by the
Magnoliophyta group. The highest number of the records refer to the
Dicotyledones (90%), followed by the
Monocotyledones (9.7%). The
Pinophyta group is represented by a single family of
Pinaceae , one genus and one species
Larix sibirica
(0.3% of records).
